## Functions

<table><thead><tr><th>

Function


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[combineStaticFilters(filterA, filterB, combinator)](./search-headless.combinestaticfilters.md)


</td><td>

Creates a [StaticFilter](./search-headless.staticfilter.md) by applying the specified [FilterCombinator](./search-headless.filtercombinator.md) to the two static filters. Throws an error if an attempt is made to combine a conjunction static filter using [FilterCombinator.OR](./search-headless.filtercombinator.md)<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[createDateRangeStaticFilter(fieldId, range)](./search-headless.createdaterangestaticfilter.md)


</td><td>

Creates a [StaticFilter](./search-headless.staticfilter.md) that matches all results where the given field value falls in a specific Date [BoundedRange](./search-headless.boundedrange.md)<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[createEqualsStaticFilter(fieldId, value)](./search-headless.createequalsstaticfilter.md)


</td><td>

Creates a [FieldValueStaticFilter](./search-headless.fieldvaluestaticfilter.md) that ensures all results will match a specific field value.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[createNearMeStaticFilter(position)](./search-headless.createnearmestaticfilter.md)


</td><td>

Creates a [FieldValueStaticFilter](./search-headless.fieldvaluestaticfilter.md) that matches all results within a certain radius of the given position.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[createNumberRangeStaticFilter(fieldId, range)](./search-headless.createnumberrangestaticfilter.md)


</td><td>

Creates a [StaticFilter](./search-headless.staticfilter.md) that matches all results where the given field value falls in a specific number [BoundedRange](./search-headless.boundedrange.md)<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[provideHeadless(config)](./search-headless.provideheadless.md)


</td><td>

Supplies a new instance of [SearchHeadless](./search-headless.searchheadless.md)<!-- -->, using the provided configuration.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

[SpellCheck](./search-headless.spellcheck.md)


</td><td>

A spellcheck response from a search query.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[SpellCheckState](./search-headless.spellcheckstate.md)


</td><td>

Maintains whether spellcheck is enabled and the spellcheck response from the latest search.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

The state representing a SearchHeadless instance.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[StateListener](./search-headless.statelistener.md)


</td><td>

Represents a listener for a specific value of type T in the state.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[StateManager](./search-headless.statemanager.md)


</td><td>

Manages the information contained in the state for a SearchHeadless instance.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

A direct answer whose source is a string or string list field in the knowledge graph.


</td></tr>

</td><td>

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

</td></tr>

</td><td>

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td></tr>
